name: Python 3 Scraper Project
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install -y wget ca-certificates; wget -O /tmp/chrome.deb https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb; sudo apt-get install -y /tmp/chrome.deb; rm /tmp/chrome.deb; python -m pip install -r requirements.txt'
